description: The AWS::SSM::Document resource is an SSM document in AWS Systems Manager that defines the actions that Systems Manager performs, which can be used to set up and run commands on your instances.

Key.description: The key of a key-value pair that identifies the location of an attachment to a document.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key of a key-value pair that identifies the location of an attachment to a document.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SourceUrl | S3FileUrl | AttachmentReference  
Update requires: No interruption

Values.description: The value of a key-value pair that identifies the location of an attachment to a document. The format for Value depends on the type of key you specify.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100000  
Update requires: No interruption

Values.markdownDescription:
The value of a key-value pair that identifies the location of an attachment to a document. The format for Value depends on the type of key you specify.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: The name of the document attachment file.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the document attachment file.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

AttachmentsSource.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
The name of the tag.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
The value of the tag.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: The name of the required SSM document. The name can be an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the required SSM document. The name can be an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 200  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-.:/]{3,200}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Version.description: The document version required by the current document.
Version.markdownDescription:
The document version required by the current document.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 8  
Pattern: ([$]LATEST|[$]DEFAULT|^[1-9][0-9]*$)  
Update requires: No interruption

DocumentRequires.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Content.description: The content for the Systems Manager document in JSON, YAML or String format.
Content.markdownDescription:
The content for the Systems Manager document in JSON, YAML or String format.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: ['object', 'string']  
Update requires: Some interruptions

Attachments.description: A list of key and value pairs that describe attachments to a version of a document.
Attachments.markdownDescription:
A list of key and value pairs that describe attachments to a version of a document.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Some interruptions

Name.description: A name for the Systems Manager document.
Name.markdownDescription:
A name for the Systems Manager document.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-.]{3,128}$  
Update requires: Replacement

VersionName.description: An optional field specifying the version of the artifact you are creating with the document. This value is unique across all versions of a document, and cannot be changed.
VersionName.markdownDescription:
An optional field specifying the version of the artifact you are creating with the document. This value is unique across all versions of a document, and cannot be changed.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-.]{1,128}$  
Update requires: Some interruptions

DocumentType.description: The type of document to create.
DocumentType.markdownDescription:
The type of document to create.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ApplicationConfiguration | ApplicationConfigurationSchema | Automation | Automation.ChangeTemplate | ChangeCalendar | CloudFormation | Command | DeploymentStrategy | Package | Policy | ProblemAnalysis | ProblemAnalysisTemplate | Session  
Update requires: Replacement

DocumentFormat.description: Specify the document format for the request. The document format can be either JSON or YAML. JSON is the default format.
DocumentFormat.markdownDescription:
Specify the document format for the request. The document format can be either JSON or YAML. JSON is the default format.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: YAML | JSON | TEXT  
Update requires: Some interruptions

TargetType.description: Specify a target type to define the kinds of resources the document can run on.
TargetType.markdownDescription:
Specify a target type to define the kinds of resources the document can run on.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^\/[\w\.\-\:\/]*$  
Update requires: Some interruptions

Tags.description: Optional metadata that you assign to a resource. Tags enable you to categorize a resource in different ways, such as by purpose, owner, or environment.
Tags.markdownDescription:
Optional metadata that you assign to a resource. Tags enable you to categorize a resource in different ways, such as by purpose, owner, or environment.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Requires.description: A list of SSM documents required by a document. For example, an ApplicationConfiguration document requires an ApplicationConfigurationSchema document.
Requires.markdownDescription:
A list of SSM documents required by a document. For example, an ApplicationConfiguration document requires an ApplicationConfigurationSchema document.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Some interruptions

UpdateMethod.description: Update method - when set to 'Replace', the update will replace the existing document; when set to 'NewVersion', the update will create a new version.
UpdateMethod.markdownDescription:
Update method - when set to 'Replace', the update will replace the existing document; when set to 'NewVersion', the update will create a new version.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: Replace | NewVersion  
Update requires: No interruption
